LOW_EXERCISE.pain: I don't have time for long workouts
LOW_EXERCISE.micro_action: Take a 10-minute walk during lunch break
LOW_EXERCISE.talk_track: Even small amounts of movement add up to big health benefits

ALCOHOL_HIGH.pain: I use wine to relax after stressful days
ALCOHOL_HIGH.micro_action: Replace one drink per week with herbal tea
ALCOHOL_HIGH.talk_track: Finding new ways to unwind protects your health without sacrificing relaxation

OVERDUE_SCREENING.pain: I keep putting off scheduling appointments
OVERDUE_SCREENING.micro_action: Set a 15-minute calendar reminder to call your doctor
OVERDUE_SCREENING.talk_track: Taking charge of your screening schedule puts you back in control

DENSE_BREAST.pain: I'm confused about what screening I actually need

POOR_DIET.pain: Healthy eating feels overwhelming and expensive

HIGH_STRESS.pain: I feel overwhelmed and don't know how to relax
HIGH_STRESS.micro_action: Try a 3-minute breathing exercise before bed

POOR_SLEEP.pain: My mind races when I try to fall asleep
